snippet: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas has been very successful at killing laws by telling legislators not to even bother sending him something that would be doomed on arrival at his desk.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas has been very successful at killing laws by telling legislators not to even bother sending him something that would be doomed on arrival at his desk.

headline.seo: Dead Before Arrival: How Rick Perry ‘Pre-Vetoes’ Legislation
headline.main: Dead Before Arrival: How to Kill Legislation
headline.print_headline: Dead Before Arrival: How to Kill Legislation
